name: sahl
description:
I am Sahl Whatsapp Chuddy Buddy built in NodeJs to make experience better
	 if Any Problem : www.youtube.com/eliahhango

CAN_WELCOME.description: put 'false' or 'true' to enable & disable WELCOME

CAN_GOODBYE.description: put 'false' or 'true' to enable & disable GOODBYE

TZ.description: Put TIME_ZONE according to your location

FLUSH.description: Make it 'true' if bot connected but not responed (After deployement!)

WARN_COUNT.description: Warn count for users to kick/block when warn limit exceed!

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Put Your Heroku Api Key Here

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put Your Heroku App Name Here

MSGS_IN_LOG.description: Fill the value -true- if you want to see Messages in logs.

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot. you can set `all | . | .!*`

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com

ELEVENLAB_API_KEY.description: Put your ElevenLab api key here for Aitts. Watch tutorial from https://youtube.com/@eliahhango

REMOVE_BG_KEY.description: put your REMOVE BG KEY here.Get it from removeBg.com

MODE.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public/private, if private then only bot number can use it. If public then everyone can use it.
